scripts.coverage:production: QUERY='fully supports es6-module AND fully supports cryptography AND >= 0.2% in my stats AND last 3 years, not dead' npm run coverage
scripts.coverage:next: QUERY='fully supports es6-module AND fully supports cryptography AND fully supports css-color-function AND >= 0.2% in my stats AND last 3 years, not dead' npm run coverage
scripts.build:production: npm run coverage:production > coverage/production.json && cat coverage/production.json | npx coverage-analyze > coverage/production.tests.json
scripts.build:next: npm run coverage:next > coverage/next.json && cat coverage/next.json | npx coverage-analyze > coverage/next.tests.json
scripts.build: npm run build:production && npm run build:next
